mapper.select: SELECT t.id, p.`name` as productName, t.price, t.state, t.pay_type, t.pay_number, t.create_time, t.operate_time, t.state FROM t_order t LEFT JOIN product p on p.id = t.product_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} order by t.id desc

SELECT count( 1 ) AS orderNumber, date_format ( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as days FROM t_order WHERE YEAR ( create_time ) = YEAR ( now()) AND MONTH ( create_time ) GROUP BY date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )

SELECT sum( price ) AS price, date_format ( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS days FROM t_order WHERE YEAR ( create_time ) = YEAR ( now()) AND MONTH ( create_time ) and state = 1 GROUP BY date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )
